name: 2D story
description:
Because this game is adapted from one of the chapters of the Chinese novel "The Writings of Nan Yin Zhai", I like the supernatural and very human story. The story is about a strange love story in feudal China where the heroine is a flower fairy who originally didn't believe in love but was moved by love in the human world and this ends up using her soul to restore light to a man's eyes while she disappears into the world.

The final product is not exactly a game, as there is not much of a game structure or story line branching out. It is closer to an interactive novel. Because the main focus is on the focus. The painting style is beautiful, so I echoed it with a beautiful chinoiserie soundtrack.

Of course there is still a lot of room for improvement in this little game, and I will continue to improve it if I have time.
